Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the casting and characters in 'Fifty Shades of Grey'?
Options:
A. Charlie Hunnam was initially cast as Christian Grey.
B. Dakota Johnson plays the role of Anastasia Steele.
C. Jamie Dornan replaced Charlie Hunnam due to scheduling conflicts.
D. Anastasia Steele is a character attending Washington State University.
Answer: A) Charlie Hunnam was initially cast as Christian Grey., B) Dakota Johnson plays the role of Anastasia Steele., C) Jamie Dornan replaced Charlie Hunnam due to scheduling conflicts., D) Anastasia Steele is a character attending Washington State University.
